landingPage.leftHeading: Register a company and open a business account Fast & Simple!
landingPage.leftText: Get the stress-free services and expert support you need to register and manage a company quickly and digitally!
landingPage.rightSubHeading: Focus on your business, while we manage your books and compliance
landingPage.rightP: From bookkeeping to payroll, and corporate secretary, bring peace of mind to your back office with our experts!

ApplicantInfoForm.heading: Applicant Information
ApplicantInfoForm.paragraph: This form must be filled out by the representative of the Hong Kong company. The information will be kept as KYC and Client Due Diligence documents.
ApplicantInfoForm.relationHeading: Relationship between the above applicant and the Hong Kong company to be established
ApplicantInfoForm.relationList1: Director of the Hong Kong company
ApplicantInfoForm.relationList2: Delegated by the director of the Hong Kong company
ApplicantInfoForm.relationList3: Shareholder of the Hong Kong company holding majority of the shares
ApplicantInfoForm.relationList4: A professional(e.g. lawyer, accountant) who provides incorporation advice to the Hong Kong company
ApplicantInfoForm.compName: Name of the Hong Kong company you wish to register
ApplicantInfoForm.contactInfo: Contact information of the above applicant
ApplicantInfoForm.compNameInfo: The company name must be in English as a minimum requirement, and can also be in Chinese(traditional Chinese only; simplified Chinese is not allowed). However, a combination of English and Chinese (except for English abbreviations such as HK) is not allowed, and must be written as Limited in full at the end of the English name, and must be written as 有限公司 at the end of the Chinese name. The company name can be a combination of uppercase letters/lowercase letters/numbers/periods/commas/parentheses, and other special characters are not allowed. International can be abbreviated as Int'l. The company name cannot be registered if there is a company previously registered under the same or similar company name. Accordingly, if you enter the three different company names you wish to register in the order of 1st / 2nd / 3rd preference, we will check the names and register in the order of your preferences.

businessNatureList.name: Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities

Quarrying and other mining of non-metal ores
Manufacture of leather and related products

Printing and reproduction of recorded media
Manufacture of coke and refined petroleum products
Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products
Manufacture of pharmaceuticals, medicinal chemical and botanical products
Manufacture of rubber and plastics products (except furniture, toys, sports goods and stationery)
Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products
Manufacture of fabricated metal products (except machinery and equipment)
Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products
Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c.
Repair and installation of machinery and equipment
Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery
Remediation activities and other waste management services
Warehousing and support activities for transportation
Motion picture, video and television programme production, sound recording and music publishing activities
Financial service activities, including investment and holding companies, and the activities of trusts, funds and similar financial entities.
Activities auxiliary to financial service and insurance activities
Activities of head offices; management and management consultancy activities
Architecture and engineering activities, technical testing and analysis
Other professional, scientific and technical activities
Travel agency, reservation service and related activities
Services to buildings and landscape care activities
Office administrative, office support and other business support activities
Libraries, archives, museums and other cultural activities
Activities of amusement parks and theme parks
Repair of motor vehicles, motorcycles, computers, personal and household goods
Activities of households as employers of domestic personnel
Goods- and services-producing activities of private households for own use
Activities of extraterritorial organisations and bodies

AmlCdd.legal_assessment_description: Are there any legal or ethical issues such as money laundering, gambling, tax evasion, asset concealment, avoidance of illegal business, fraud, etc.?
AmlCdd.business_information_title: Business Information of the Hong Kong company
AmlCdd.business_information_description: In this section, please provide information of the Hong Kong Company and related business to be established
AmlCdd.dialog_initial_message: All fields must be filled out carefully. Once completed, this form will not be editable.
AmlCdd.dialog_acknowledgement_title: Is the data you entered correct? Please confirm.
AmlCdd.dialog_acknowledgement_message: I confirm that the data entered is correct.
AmlCdd.dialog_consultation_message: It seems that you will need to consult before proceeding. We will check the contents of your reply and our consultant will contact you shortly. Thank you.

questions.sanctioned_countries: Does the Hong Kong company, to the best of your knowledge, have any current or planned business activity in the following countries/regions (Iran, Sudan, North Korea, Syria, Cuba, South Sudan, Belarus or Zimbabwe)?
questions.sanctions_presence: To the best of your knowledge, does the Hong Kong company or any of the company's connected or other related parties have a presence in Iran, Sudan, North Korea, Syria or Cuba, and/or are currently targeted by sanctions administered by the following bodies: UN, EU, UN/HMT, HKMA, OFAC, or as part of local sanctions law?
questions.crimea_presence: To the best of your knowledge, does the Hong Kong company or any of its connected or other related parties have any current or planned business activities in Crimea/Sevastopol Regions?
questions.russian_business_presence: To the best of your knowledge, does the Hong Kong company have any current or planned exposure to Russia in the energy/oil/gas sector, the military, or defense?

AmlCdd.acknowledgement_error: Please accept the legal acknowledgement before proceeding.
AmlCdd.error_message: An error occurred while submitting the request.

ServiceAgreementDocument.title: Company Secretary Service Agreement
ServiceAgreementDocument.section1Content: The purpose of this agreement is to prevent any misunderstandings or disputes that may arise in relation to the scope of Services provided by Secretary and its limitations to Client.
ServiceAgreementDocument.section2Title: 2. Role of Hong Kong Company Secretary and Limitation of Liability
ServiceAgreementDocument.section2_1Content: We(Secretary) will be registered as a secretary in Client's files in accordance with the Hong Kong Companies Ordinance(Cap 622) and the Articles of Association of Client...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section2_2Content: The registration of a secretary is required by Hong Kong Companies Ordinance (Cap622)...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section3Title: 3. Providing Registered Address and Its Limitations of Liability
ServiceAgreementDocument.section3_1Content: The address registered in Client shall be the registered address in Hong Kong provided by Secretary...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section3_2Content: The address which Secretary provides will be Client's registered address, however, this does not mean that Secretary will provide Client's business or physical space...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section3_3Content: Client must not use the registered address provided by Secretary for abuse or illegal use...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section3_4Content: Client's incoming mails will be opened and scanned by Secretary according to the letter of consent...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section3_5Content: Client shall not send or request third parties to send parcels and goods to the Client's registered address provided by Secretary...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section4_1Content: Client shall cooperate with Secretary in good faith and shall provide all necessary information and documents...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section4_2Content: The brief business and operational advice services provided by Secretary...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section5Content: For the performance of Services, Secretary shall be paid the amount stated in the attached invoice...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section6Content: Neither Client nor Secretary shall assign or otherwise transfer its rights...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section7Content: Both parties shall hold confidential all business or technical information obtained...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section8Content: This Agreement is the final and complete understanding of Client and Secretary...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section9Content: Any provisions of this Agreement held in violation of any law or ordinance...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section10Content: This Agreement shall not create any rights or benefits in any person...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section11Content: Unless otherwise provided in an attachment, this Agreement shall be performed and construed under the laws of Hong Kong...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section12Content: In the event of mediation, arbitration or litigation between Client and Secretary...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section13_1Content: Client confirms and declares that none of the business...
ServiceAgreementDocument.section13_2Content: Client agrees to provide documentations and information for the conduct of Services...

ServiceSelection.HongKongRegistrarOfCompaniesFee: Hong Kong Registrar of Companies registration (government) fee
ServiceSelection.RegisteredOfficeAddressAnnualFee: Annual service fee for registered office address
ServiceSelection.KYCFeeLegalPerson: KYC / Due Diligence fee For Legal Person
ServiceSelection.CorrespondenceAddressFee: Correspondence Address Annual Service fee per person (optional)
ServiceSelection.IncorporationAndFees: Incorporation and First Year Annual Fees Details

InformationIncorporation.registrationDetails: Registration details of the Hong Kong company
InformationIncorporation.registrationDescription: In this section, please provide information on the shares, shareholders, and directors to be filed in the Hong Kong company.
InformationIncorporation.paymentTooltip: Hong Kong is subject to the New Companies Ordinance (Cap. 622) revised as of March 3, 2014...
InformationIncorporation.paymentOption_deposit: Payment amount of the share capital will be deposited to the bank account after opening the corporate account
InformationIncorporation.paymentOption_pettyCash: Payment amount of the share capital will be made in cash, and it will be held as petty cash in the company and used for expenses when incurred
InformationIncorporation.baseCurrency: The base currency of the share capital
InformationIncorporation.currencyTooltip: It is recommended that the currency of the share capital be the same as the functional currency...
InformationIncorporation.shareCapitalAmount: The total amount of the share capital to be paid
InformationIncorporation.amountTooltip: This is the amount according to the above base currency. Example) USD 1,000
InformationIncorporation.numShares: Total number of shares to be issued (at least 1 share)
InformationIncorporation.numSharesTooltip: After establishment, capital increases such as the issuance of new shares...
InformationIncorporation.sharesOption_total_capital_divided_by_1_: Total capital divided by $1 (par value per share = $1; general convention to issue the share in HK)
InformationIncorporation.sharesOption_1_share_at_least_1_share_to: 1 share (at least 1 share to be issued) (1 share price = total capital)
